Installation and Use
--------------------
For complete documentation go to <http://www.losonczy.org/sima>

Dependencies
-------------
numpy >= 1.6.2
scipy >= 0.13.0
matplotlib >= 1.2.1
cython
mdp >= 3.3
opencv >= 2.4.8 <http://opencv.org/downloads.html>
scikit-image >= 0.9.3
shapely >= 1.2.14
